title: Easy peasy gingerbread house
ingredients: ['Gingerbread', '650g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '225g butter, cut into small cubes', '200g caster sugar', '250ml honey', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', 'Icing', '200g icing sugar', '2 or 3 tablespoons hot water', '1 tablespoon lemon juice']
